original_text: ‘These are the rules about the Levites: The men who are 25 years old or older must go in to work in the Tent of Meeting.
korean_text: 레위인은 이같이 할지니 곧 이십오 세 이상으로는 회막에 들어가서 복무하고 봉사할 것이요

sentences.original_text: These are the rules about the Levites:
The men who are 25 years old or older
must go in to work in the Tent of Meeting.
